title: 'My sessions are designed to demystify AI': Trainer to host workshops for businesses at The Waterfront
description: Black Country businesses are invited to embrace the opportunities of artificial intelligence (AI) as PR consultant and AI trainer Laura Tatton launches a series of workshops at The Waterfront, in Brierley Hill, this autumn.
content:
Laura, who runs ConsuLT PR & Marketing Ltd, says her new workshops aim to show businesses how AI can boost productivity, streamline tasks, and open up fresh opportunities in a practical, jargon-free way.
She's running a three-part series of workshops... [2062 chars]

title: OpenEvidence Raises $200 Million for a ChatGPT for Medicine
description: The three-year-old artificial intelligence start-up has drawn investor attention, and money, as its use among doctors, nurses and others skyrockets.
content:

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Market Waves: AI Titans Boost Wall Street Amid Volatility
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Sora’s uncanny AI makes it difficult to distinguish real from fake
description: How do silly videos align with OpenAI’s goal of building ethical artificial general intelligence for the good of humanity?
content: When I opened Sora, OpenAI’s new social-media app, the first video I saw was Queen Elizabeth II in a Costco explaining why she loves cheese puffs. Next was a South Park parody, featuring the Pepe the Frog meme ranting about Tylenol and babies. Later,... [6248 chars]
